tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tutorials (
    tutorial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE guides (
    guide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guide_title VARCHAR(255),
    guide_category VARCHAR(50),
    guide_url VARCHAR(255),
    guide_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    tutorial_id INT REFERENCES tutorials(tutorial_id),
    completed BOOLEAN,
    progress_percent INT
);

CREATE TABLE tutorials (
    tutorial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE steps (
    step_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tutorial_id UUID REFERENCES tutorials(tutorial_id),
    step_number INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tutorial_id UUID REFERENCES tutorials(tutorial_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
    comment TEXT
);
